array.string: Increases the damage of Rail Shot by 3%.
Increases the damage of Rail Shot by 6%.
Increases damage done by all fire effects by 2%.
Increases damage done by all fire effects by 4%.
Increases damage done by all fire effects by 6%.
Flame Burst and Flame Sweep combust the target, lowering its damage dealt by 2% for 15 seconds.
Flame Burst and Flame Sweep combust the target, lowering its damage dealt by 4% for 30 seconds.

Rocket Punch now has a 50% chance to trigger your Ion Gas Cylinder. In addition, when Ion Gas Cylinder deals damage, it has a (current weapon)% chance to shock the target for 6 additional energy damage over ?.

Rocket Punch now has a 100% chance to trigger your Ion Gas Cylinder. In addition, when Ion Gas Cylinder deals damage, it has a (current weapon)% chance to shock the target for 12 additional energy damage over ?.
Ion Gas Cylinder damage now lowers the movement speed of the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
Increases absorption by 3% and reduces the cooldown of Kolto Overload by 30 seconds.
Increases absorption by 6% and reduces the cooldown of Kolto Overload by 60 seconds.
Sprays the immediate area with oil. Nearby enemies become unbalanced and their accuracy of ranged and melee attacks is lowered by 20% for 18.
Increases shield chance by 1%. In addition, shielding an attack has a 25% chance to vent 8 heat. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Increases shield chance by 2%. In addition, shielding an attack has a 50% chance to vent 8 heat. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.

Increases the critical chance of Rocket Punch and Flame Sweep by 15%. In addition, shielding an attack has a 25% chance to finish the cooldown on Rocket Punch. This effect cannot occur more than once every 4.5 seconds.

Increases the critical chance of Rocket Punch and Flame Sweep by 30%. In addition, shielding an attack has a 50% chance to finish the cooldown on Rocket Punch. This effect cannot occur more than once every 4.5 seconds.
Further increases damage reduction while Ion Gas Cylinder is active by 1%.
Further increases damage reduction while Ion Gas Cylinder is active by 2%.
Increases the damage dealt by Ion Gas Cylinder by 25% and increases its shock duration by 3 seconds.
Grapple has a 50% chance to immobilize the target for 3 seconds. In addition, your Stealth Scan has a ?% chance to immobilize the targets it reveals for 3 seconds.
Grapple has a 100% chance to immobilize the target for 3 seconds. In addition, your Stealth Scan has a ?% chance to immobilize the targets it reveals for 3 seconds.
Increases the critical strike bonus damage of Rocket Punch and Flame Sweep by 15%.
Increases the critical strike bonus damage of Rocket Punch and Flame Sweep by 30%.
Jumps to a distant target, dealing (current weapon) kinetic damage, interrupting the target's current action and immobilizing the target for 3. Cannot be used against targets in cover.
Jet Charge has a 50% chance to increase your movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
Jet Charge has a 100% chance to increase your movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
Discharges 8 heat into a fiery blast, dealing (current weapon) elemental damage.
Rail Shot ignores 20% of the target's armor.
Rail Shot ignores 40% of the target's armor.
Rail Shot ignores 60% of the target's armor.
Reduces the cooldown of Electro Dart by 5.
Reduces the cooldown of Electro Dart by 10.
Increases the critical hit chance of all fire effects by 3%.
Increases the critical hit chance of all fire effects by 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Thrower by 1.5 and Grapple by 5.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Thrower by 3 and Grapple by 10.
Increases the damage dealt by Flame Burst and Retractable Blade by 3%.
Increases the damage dealt by Flame Burst and Retractable Blade by 6%.

Increases the effect of your gas cylinders while they are active: Combustible Gas Cylinder: Increases the tech critical hit chance by 3%. High Energy Gas Cylinder: Further increases all internal and elemental damage dealt by 3%. Ion Gas Cylinder: Increases the damage dealt by Ion Gas Cylinder 8%.
While High Energy Gas Cylinder is active, you have a 50% chance to vent 8 heat every 6 seconds.
While High Energy Gas Cylinder is active, you have a 100% chance to vent 8 heat every 6 seconds.
Plunges a retractable blade into the target that deals (current weapon) kinetic damage and causes the target to bleed for (current weapon) internal damage over 15.
Increases movement speed by 7.5% while High Energy Gas Cylinder is active.
Increases movement speed by 15% while High Energy Gas Cylinder is active.
Reduces the cooldown of Quell by 1.
Reduces the cooldown of Quell by 2.
Increases the damage dealt by Retractable Blade's bleed effect by 5%.
Increases the damage dealt by Retractable Blade's bleed effect by 10%.
Increases the damage dealt by Retractable Blade's bleed effect by 15%.
Flame Burst has a 15% chance and Immolate has a 50% chance to make your next Rocket Punch free. This effect lasts 15.
Flame Burst has a 30% chance and Immolate has a 100% chance to make your next Rocket Punch free. This effect lasts 30.
When you vent heat, you regen 7% of your health over 10 seconds.
Rocket Punch and Retractable Blade have a 25% chance to make your next Rail Shot critically hit automatically.
Grants 8 of immunity from movement-impairing effects, knockdowns and physics and increases movement speed by 30%.
Flame Burst and Flame Sweep have a 50% chance to grant Prototype Flame Thrower, increasing the damage dealt by your next Flame Thrower by 10%. Stacks up to 5 times.
Flame Burst and Flame Sweep have a 100% chance to grant Prototype Flame Thrower, increasing the damage dealt by your next Flame Thrower by 10%. Stacks up to 5 times.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Rocket Punch, Flame Burst and Immolate by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Rocket Punch, Flame Burst and Immolate by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Rocket Punch, Flame Burst and Immolate by 30%.
While stunned, you take 10% less damage.
While stunned, you take 20% less damage.
Sprays the target with fuel and ignites it into a fireball that deals (current weapon) elemental damage.
Increases the damage dealt by Rocket Punch by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by Rocket Punch by 8%.
Flame Burst has a 33.34% chance to trigger your Combustible Gas Cylinder if active.
Flame Burst has a 66.68% chance to trigger your Combustible Gas Cylinder if active.
Flame Burst has a 100.02% chance to trigger your Combustible Gas Cylinder if active.
You have a 50% chance to vent 8 heat when stunned, immobilized, knocked down or otherwise incapacitated.
You have a 100% chance to vent 8 heat when stunned, immobilized, knocked down or otherwise incapacitated.
Combustible Gas Cylinder has a 2% chance when it applies its effects to reduce the movement speed of the target by 50% for 50 seconds.
Combustible Gas Cylinder has a 4% chance when it applies its effects to reduce the movement speed of the target by 50% for 100 seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by Combustible Gas Cylinder by 10% and its chance to be triggered by 2%.
Increases the damage dealt by Combustible Gas Cylinder by 20% and its chance to be triggered by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by Combustible Gas Cylinder by 30% and its chance to be triggered by 6%.
Increases stealth detection by 1, melee and ranged defense by 2.5%, and reduces the cooldown of Stealth Scan by ? seconds.
Increases stealth detection by 2, melee and ranged defense by 5%, and reduces the cooldown of Stealth Scan by ? seconds.
Fires a missile that explodes on contact, igniting the target for (current weapon) elemental damage and an additional (current weapon) elemental damage over 18.

Rail Shot ignores 50% of the target's armor. In addition, if Rail Shot hits a burning target, it has a 15% chance to vent 8 heat and refresh the duration of your Combustible Gas Cylinder's burn effect if present.

Rail Shot ignores 100% of the target's armor. In addition, if Rail Shot hits a burning target, it has a 30% chance to vent 8 heat and refresh the duration of your Combustible Gas Cylinder's burn effect if present.
Energy Shield has a 50% chance to remove all movement-impairing effects when activated.
Energy Shield has a 100% chance to remove all movement-impairing effects when activated.
Flame Burst has a 10% chance and Rocket Punch has a 15% chance to finish the cooldown on Rail Shot and make the next Rail Shot free.
Flame Burst has a 20% chance and Rocket Punch has a 30% chance to finish the cooldown on Rail Shot and make the next Rail Shot free.
Flame Burst has a 30% chance and Rocket Punch has a 45% chance to finish the cooldown on Rail Shot and make the next Rail Shot free.
Reduces the cooldown of Vent Heat by 15.
Reduces the cooldown of Vent Heat by 30.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Combustible Gas Cylinder, Rail Shot, Incendiary Missile and Thermal Detonator by 15%.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Combustible Gas Cylinder, Rail Shot, Incendiary Missile and Thermal Detonator by 30%.
Rapid Shots, Rocket Punch, Rail Shot, Unload and Flame Sweep deal 3% additional damage to burning targets.
Rapid Shots, Rocket Punch, Rail Shot, Unload and Flame Sweep deal 6% additional damage to burning targets.
Rapid Shots, Rocket Punch, Rail Shot, Unload and Flame Sweep deal 9% additional damage to burning targets.
When you take damage, you have 50% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Energy Shield by 1.5. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
When you take damage, you have 100% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Energy Shield by 3. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Increases tech critical hit chance by 1% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 10% on targets below 30% max health.
Increases tech critical hit chance by 2% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 20% on targets below 30% max health.
Increases tech critical hit chance by 3% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 30% on targets below 30% max health.
Critical hits have a 50% chance to reduce the active cooldown on Kolto Overload and Thermal Sensor Override by 3. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Critical hits have a 100% chance to reduce the active cooldown on Kolto Overload and Thermal Sensor Override by 6. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.

Hurls a thermal detonator that adheres to the target and detonates after several seconds. Standard and weak enemies enter a state of panic while the explosive is active. The explosion deals (current weapon) kinetic damage when it detonates. Standard and weak targets are knocked back from the blast. Shares a 15-second cooldown with Explosive Dart.
